short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all instances of Trump's name on every page with something more tolerable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that replaces all instances of Donald Trump's name on websites with something more palatable. All nicknames are taken from late-night TV shows and other comedy writers.
